#summary Use case for handling logging into an existing user account..
#labels Phase-Requirements,Use-Cases

= Introduction =

*Description:*

A user logs into his/her account.

*Preconditions:*
 # User has already registered an account.
 # The account has been activated.
 # User is not logged in.

*Postconditions:*
 # The user will be logged into the book trader system, granting him/her access to member-only features.

= Basic Course of Action =

 # A user wants to log in.
 # The user proceeds to the log-in page.
 # The user inputs his/her email address and password and submits them to the system.
 # The system verifies that the email address and password match.
 # The system displays a success page confirming that the user is now logged in.
 # End use case.
